sentences: Muidu saage kõikjalt teada, et see on mälestuslik.
Kui keegi saadab sõnumit, saab see kätte tunduvalt kiiremini.
context: The word 'saage' can mean to obtain or acquire something, and it is often used in the context of getting information or items. It is commonly seen in phrases such as 'saage teada' (find out) or 'saage kätte' (receive).
